checkpointFrequencyNote: Create checkpoint every N tokens. Claude Sonnet 4 can handle larger context, so 20k is optimal. Options: 10000 (more frequent, 2x cost), 15000 (balanced), 20000 (recommended for Claude Sonnet 4)

costEstimates.note: Claude Sonnet 4 pricing: $3.00/1M input + $15.00/1M output tokens. Designed by Claude (me!) for AI memory. Reliable, consistent, understands what AI needs.
